# HomeOS
Ã‰tat des lieux: [ETAT_LIEUX.md](ETAT_LIEUX.md)

## Introduction
HomeOS is a package for construction and project management. It provides a command-line interface (CLI) for managing projects and a set of tools for automating tasks.

## Links
* [PRD AETHERFLOW.md](PRD_AETHERFLOW.md)
* [Plan Genome Frontend](plan_genome_frontend.md)
* [ETAT_LIEUX.md](ETAT_LIEUX.md)

## Typical Usage
To use HomeOS, simply run the `homeos` command in your terminal. You can switch between construction and project modes using the `--construction` flag.

## Role of Package
HomeOS provides a set of tools for automating tasks and managing projects. It includes a CLI for managing projects and a set of APIs for integrating with other tools.
